ai-tha-ap171:1.2_0: was a great number of association.
ai-tha-ap171:1.4_0: I’m bound by you to my hermits,
ai-tha-ap171:2.1_0: assembled them all that had happened,
ai-tha-ap171:2.3_0: I shall not give to the Sangha,
ai-tha-ap171:3.1_0: She replied, and after replying to them,
ai-tha-ap171:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap171:4.4_0: as a gift is very fruitful.
ai-tha-ap171:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Piṅgaka.
ai-tha-ap171:8.1_0: for the ninth Elder Nun Uppalavaṇṇā.
